title: Get Out of the Office and Into the Wild with Team Building Survival Hikes
text: HikeMore Adventures: By Email RSS Feeds: Get Out of the Office and Into the Wild with Team Building Survival Hikes HikeMore Adventures, a NC-based outdoor adventure guide service and outfitter, now offers the ultimate corporate team-building program. Their unique wilderness survival hike encourages communication, inspires enthusiasm, and builds trust. Lincolnton, NC, September 08, 2015 --( PR.com )-- HikeMore Adventures, a NC-based outdoor adventure guide service and outfitter, now offers the ultimate corporate team-building program.Their unique wilderness survival hike encourages communication, inspires enthusiasm, and builds trust.“Corporate team-building activities are essential in creating a cohesive environment for your employees,” says Curt Teague, owner and certified Backcountry Wilderness Survival Instructor. “When you’re learning to survive in the elements, teamwork is naturally strengthened. Also, during our wilderness survival hike, office politics and sales quotas diminish substantially against the backdrop of sweeping mountain vistas.”These one- to three-day hikes take teams through basics like navigation, shelter construction, fire making, hunting, plant and tree identification, and campfire cooking. Groups traverse throughout the Pisgah National Forest and Linville Gorge Wilderness areas (within the Pisgah). All trips include meals, and optional gear rental is available. HikeMore Adventures holds the rare official US Park Service Permit, which allows them to guide in all designated US Wilderness areas.The HikeMore Adventures team includes:Curt Teague, Guide: Curt is adult, pediatric, and infant CPR certified, as well as a First Aid and AED first responder. He’s also a certified Backcountry Wilderness Survival Instructor specializing in backcountry fishing, shelter building, campfire cooking, and other vital survival skills.Justin Costner, Photographer: In addition to his extensive backcountry hiking and camping experience, Justin captures every adventure in stunning detail. Your team’s survival experience will be beautifully documented. Justin’s adventure and landscaping photography has garnered features in Blue Ridge Outdoors Magazine, REI, and North Face.Yan Luss, Wilderness Instructor: Yan’s wilderness experience spans the globe – having trekked Kenya, Swiss Alps, southern Spain and northern California (among others). Yan specializes in private tours that include hiking, primitive camping, and kayaking.For additional information about corporate team-building survival hikes, contact Curt Teague at 828-595-4453 or info@hikemoreadventures.com. You can also visit the website at HikeMoreAdventures.com.About HikeMore AdventuresHikeMore is a full service high-end adventure guide service located in Morganton, NC. They offer custom tailored "barefoot luxury" hiking, camping, kayaking, mountain climbing, fishing, wilderness survival, and cross-country national park adventures. Half day, full day or extended overnight tours through the Pisgah National Forest and outlying areas are available.They also provide backpacks, tents, trekking poles, sleeping bags and all hiking and camping equipment that you may need for half-day hikes, full-day hikes, and extended tours. Other tours include Waterfall Tours, Fly Fishing expeditions, and Landscape Photography Lessons. Contact Information
